item.description:
Stop by and join other Boston Young Professionals for a private early evening social happy hour. We've reserved a semi-private area for our members, so there will be no confusion as to who is with our group, where we're located, etc. Expect to meet 25-40 people ages 23-47. Our events attract an ethnically diverse crowd of educated young professionals.

Cash Bar Available!

ADMISSION - PLEASE READ:
$5 in advance/$10 at the door (for name tags, bar gratuity and event host)
REGISTER HERE - http://moxiebostonsocial.eventbrite.com

ADMISSION COVERS:
*Light & Limited Nibbles Served from 7pm until gone - first come, first served
*Semi-Private sectionexclusively for our members only
*Event Host and team of 2 Greeters to help with making introductions and mingling
*Nametags
*Server gratuity

AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45

IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. We have a lot of men showing up at the door without RSVPing. In order for us to work to ensure an even gender ratio, we need to have an accurate idea of men and women attending.

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO RIPPED JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals

CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Night Social
